text: And it's actually pretty great (if we do say so ourselves). Hillary's snaps will make your day?(just add hillaryclinton): @HillaryClinton's snapchat story makes my day!— Anna Knapp (@anna_kahnapp) October 7, 2015 With some dancing:  Fashion recommendations: Waking up to a pantsuit-themed snap story was just what I needed. Thx, Hils. ???? @HillaryClinton pic.twitter.com/iuTj3ILoPO— Joeface (@joseph_struhs) September 29, 2015 An acclaimed emoji game: The use of the nail polish emoji on @HillaryClinton's Snapchat is so boss. pic.twitter.com/DoHtHfCy6e— Mike Kaiser (@mikekaisersays) September 18, 2015 Friendly faces: I'd say following @HillaryClinton on snapchat was a pretty good decision pic.twitter.com/LpMhUZLD1G— Neda (@mortazineda) September 11, 2015 A pup in a cup: In case you were wondering, you should be following hillaryclinton on Snapchat. ???? pic.twitter.com/eigWQMKXjj— Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) October 1, 2015 Even a few kind words from Republicans: GOP presidential candidates sing the praise of @HillaryClinton on #snapchat! Read the love ????? #Hillary2016 #PhotoG pic.twitter.com/rWrmBbVleJ— Damon Bethea (@damonbethea1) August 21, 2015 And this cute ghost in a pantsuit! Add us on Snapchat! @hillaryclinton ???? pic.twitter.com/ZpfETuFgDM— Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) August 11, 2015
title: Press Release - Yes, Hillary Clinton Is On Snapchat
